answers.answer: Yes you can eat.  HGA1C is your blood sugar levels for the last 3 months so you don't need to fast.  Good luck!

I have mines tomorrow at 8:30 in the morning and they asked me not to eat anything after midnight.  So if I was u I wouldn't eat. I actually had one alredy but I ate an aple before they did it and it went wrong so they have to do another one tomorrw
Hi I work for and Endocrinologist (diabetes doc) and your A1c is a backround check  for the past 3 months on your sugars so you can eat :-)

question: I have my a1c test tomorrow and I wondered if you eat before it? and this is my 4th pregnancy but I've never had one before so I don't know what to expect. any suggestions?
title: A1c testing
